entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch contol ignores OnColor and ThumbColor #19380
  • Not able to update CollectionView header #19379
  • Events triggered unexpectedly #19378
  • [Testing] Replace uses of Wait with an implementation that fails when the condition is never true #19376
    Backlog
  • App crash when is started from another app. #19374
  • Resizetizer not cleaning up after image files are deleted #19373
    Backlog
  • Group headers randomly disappear on iOS When updated #19372
    Backlog
  • TranslationX/Y Changes Won't Be Applied to Bounds In AbsoluteLayout #19368
  • [Windows] - Publish on store failed with Payload contains two or more files with the same destination path 'LibMobile.pdb' #19367
  • If ListView IsEnabled is false, items and PullToRefresh are still enabled #19366
  • DEP0700 ERROR - Registration of the app failed. App manifest validation error... #19364
  • SwipeView Rendering issues #19363
    Backlog
  • The size of the assembly varies between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0. #19362
  • WPF Blazor cannot be started at boot. Error: There is no content at #19359
  • .NET MAUI CarouselView Items Not Visible in Release Mode #19357
  • The colors in MAUI application are wrong #19356
  • The page of a book is opening wrong angle. #19355
  • Crash when using Picker while also using UIDeviceFamily 6 #19354

Closed

  • [IOS] Maui .NET 8 The app has been terminated when start debugging #19358
  • .NET MAUI Blazor NavigationManager.Refresh() causes a flicker of a white page #18993
  • [iOS] Keyboard stays open when tapping outside of an entry #19375
  • TableView: ViewCell with Picker disappears when updated (on Android) #19321
  • Multiple ViewCell in a single TableView causes them to collapse on Android #10064
    Backlog
  • Custom ViewCells disappear in TableView #10322
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Android TableView's ViewCell won't calculate height correctly #12989
    Backlog
  • When checked on, switch in table view button in ViewCell is invisible in Android Platform #13006
    Backlog
  • TableView cells disappear when cells are updated on Android #16533
    Backlog
  • Add API to configure scope validation for dependency injection #18519
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [UITest] AutomationId not being set in Shell Tabbar #19328
  • [iOS] Margin does not work on Border inside a CollectionView #19365
  • Alert not shown in OnAppearing method #19369
  • Default Right Click context menu on Entry currently crashes for the Maui.Control.Samples project #9353
    Backlog
  • Fix test SearchBarHandlerTests.BackgroundInitializesCorrectly on iOS #13693
    Backlog
  • Mac/iOS: Clipping prevents from catching events in the background #17218
    Backlog
  • [Testing] SetSemantic tests fails on iOS 17 #19122
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [tests] The windows Frame device tests fail with : No installed components were detected. #19015
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Local Notifications in .NET MAUI Essentials custom sound is not working #19346
  • NET MAUI iOS, the background color is always gray when the CollectionView is selected #11991
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨
  • Handle Semantics flags more explicitly on iOS #19370
  • [X] Warn on non compiled bindings #19360
    area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Preserve logs from retries as they have data! #19341
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • Disable failing semantic tests on iOS #19344
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • Reduce the complexity of the AttachAndRun code #19352
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19351
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with new versions #19236
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨, stale
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
  • Correct nullable annotations on IMediaPicker #19157
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁
  • Schedule Android layout requests received during layout on the UI thread #19349
  • Remove circular reference from ShapeDrawable #19347
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D22 #18725
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C2 #18794
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test C3 #18899
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-refreshview
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR3
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, legacy-ui-test
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • XamlC WarnAsErrors. #19337
